message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. This gives you a decent share considering the money will be worth less with each round.
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, Alice, but I need to secure more for myself.  Let's see if this is a good starting point for us.
Bob, you're losing money fast!  I'm offering a bit less than my first offer, but it's still a much better deal for you than waiting longer. Take this offer while you can!
